import i18n from 'i18next';
import { initReactI18next } from 'react-i18next';
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector';

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)

    fallbackLng: 'en',
    debug: true,
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false,
    },
    resources: {
      en: {

          aboutIntro: "Founded by UN Peace Ambassador and Educational Psychologist, Amb. Beauty Tommy, the #MyDearTeacher Movement is a global initiative dedicated to transforming how the world sees, supports, and celebrates neurodiverse learners.",
          aboutOrigin: "What began as a heartfelt message in the bestselling book Dear Teacher, I Am Not Broken has grown into a global call for action.",
          aboutMissionTitle: "ğŸ¯ Our Mission",
          aboutMissionDesc: "To equip and inspire educators to teach with compassion and confidence, so all studentsâ€”especially those with special educational needsâ€”can thrive in inclusive, supportive environments.",
          aboutVisionTitle: "ğŸ‘ Our Vision",
          aboutVisionDesc: "A future where no learner is labeled as broken, and every classroom becomes a place of belonging, growth, and possibility.",
          aboutInspirationTitle: "ğŸ’¡ What Inspired the Movement",

            "ğŸ¤ SDG 17 â€“ Partnerships for the Goals"
          ],
          aboutWorkTitle: "ğŸ’¼ What We Do",

            "ğŸ“˜ Books & Publications â€“ Tools that spark dialogue",
            "ğŸ‘©ğŸ½â€ğŸ« Educator Training & Inclusion Toolkits",
            "ğŸ¤ Campaigns & Advocacy â€“ Digital and live",
            "ğŸ§  School Partnerships â€“ Inclusion frameworks",
            "ğŸ“£ Youth & Parent Engagement â€“ Voices that matter"
          ],
          aboutPartnershipsTitle: "ğŸ¤ Why Partnerships Matter",
          aboutPartnershipsDesc: "We believe change happens through collaborationâ€”with schools, government bodies, special needs centers, NGOs, and UN-aligned organizations.",
          aboutPartnerCTA: "ğŸŒŸ Partner With Us",
          aboutPartnerList: [
            "âœ… Professional development programs",
            "âœ… Inclusive consulting and frameworks",
            "âœ… Global visibility through campaigns",
            "âœ… Research-based advocacy grounded in real life"
          ]
